channel.title: Offline Server Assitance
channel.description:
Ok, so i have JDK 1.7.0_01 for compiling and what not. Then i downloaded a base server to begin modifying the way i want it. I extracted the client, and then i hit Compile and it doesnt do anything, also the ones that do work ask for an ip address so what would i enter into that for an offline server that only i would be getting on, or have access too?
Thanks

item.title: Offline Server Assitance
item.dc:creator: @brotharyan brotharyan
item.description:
@brotharyan wrote:

alright i used that ip, and it said error_game on the cmd prompt in the background behind the launcher that usually makes it runâ€¦so idk if i need to change something or what please help.

Read full topic

item.title: Offline Server Assitance
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

127.0.0.1 is the localhost ip. A.K.A offline server IP
